tweet: Exciting news! 🔥 Today, the S-African Govt. will launch the S-African National #Blockchain Alliance (#SANBA). To support the effort, @IOHK_Charles will congratulate them on video @ 9:45AM CET   Stay tuned!  https://t.co/MefdziOrQU @InputOutputHK @Switzerland_SA

South Africa is a major focus for us for driving the adoption of #Cardano.   @IOHK_Charles shared his vision for #blockchain for South Africa @sanbanetwork's launch event today.   We look forward to a fruitful collaboration we will make in this part of the world! @nathan_kaiser

Now Live! @IOHK_Charles congratulates the S African Gov. State Dept. of Sci. & Innov for launching #SANBA, an important milestone for #blockchain adoption, bringing new #DLT opportunities.  https://t.co/MefdziOrQU @InputOutputHK @Switzerland_SA @ICT_RDI_Roadmap @sanbanetwork @CSIR
This is as credible as Weiss Ratings rating Cardano as #1.

"#SANBA will attract lots of local research that can allow us to start addressing global problems such as anti-corruption that are not only endemic in #SouthAfrica, but throughout pan-#Africa and even the US." - @IOHK_Charles @sanbanetwork @Switzerland_SA @CardanoStiftung @CSIR

"#Blockchain is one of the most transformative technologies in government tech sector that can allow governments better interact and know their people, and allow entrepreneurs a whole new dimension of products they can construct that are quite innovative." - @IOHK_Charles @CSIR

Daedalus Flight is the new user testing program for our ada wallet. Visit our new-look Daedalus site to learn more and download the first build. Help make Daedalus the best it's ever been as we head towards the #Shelley era  https://t.co/FNidEUBcfe @Cardano #CardanoCommunity

Watch @iohk_Charles video message here:  https://t.co/z2AGONcc6S This is a continuation of #CardanoFoundation's efforts in #Africa that started in November 2019 in Mauritius:  https://t.co/LWsugNFAZk #Cardano #blockchain @sanbanetwork @CoinDesk @Cointelegraph @BitcoinMagazine
